dct_title_s: Grundridsning af Öen Goree, efter Her Compagnons Tegninger
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
North oriented toward lower right of sheet.
Bar scale statement: Maalestav af hundrede halve Roder.
Includes town plan, featuring Fort St. Michael and Fort St. Franciscus.
Index numbers but no apparent key.
Appears in Prévost's L'Histoire generale des voyages.
